menu.footer: This application, created with TEI Publisher, has been developed as part of the DAHN project, a partnership between Inria, the University of Le Mans and the EHESS funded by the MESRI, which goal is to establish a pipeline for the scientific digital edition of archival collections. This application is hosted on Humanum.

corpus.title: Edited texts
corpus.desc: Folder with the corpus' letters and texts.

index.title: Indexes
index.desc: Organizations, persons, places and publications mentioned in the edition, presented in four separate indexes.

history.title: History
history.desc: More on the context and content of the edition.

about.title: About
about.desc: Further information on partner institutions, funders as well as development and editorial team.

pec.title: Correspondence of d'Estournelles de Constant
pec.desc: This folder contains the corpus and the indexes of Paul d'Estournelles de Constant correspondence, as well as an history of the corpus and information about the project.

intellectuelsberlinois.title: Letters and texts: Intellectual Berlin around 1800
intellectuelsberlinois.desc: This folder contains the corpus and the indexes of letters and texts from Berlin intellectuals between 1800 and 1830.
intellectuelsberlinois.collection: The edited texts are mostly letters, but they also include other manuscripts of literary and/or scholarly significance for the intellectual activity in Berlin around 1800.

ehri.title: Early Holocaust Testimonies
ehri.desc: This folder contains the corpus of early testimonies from victims of the Holocaust.

napoleon.title: Napoleonic wars diary
napoleon.desc: This folder contains the corpus of a war diary kept during the Napoleonic wars.

bruneau.title: My War 1914-1918
bruneau.desc: This folder contains the corpus of a war story from World War I.

nachlass.title: August Boeckh - Catalogue of his papers
nachlass.desc: This folder contains the catalog of manuscripts and papers from Boeckh.
nachlass.index: Organizations, persons, places and publications mentioned in the edition, presented in four separate indexes. (This link leads to the folder of the Berlin intellectuals indexes, as the content is the same).
nachlass.collection: The texts are not yet transcribed and the metadata are the only available informations.

cds.title: Correspondance of Constance de Salm (1767-1845)
cds.desc: This folder contains the digital edition of letters written and received by Constance de Salm as well as the inventory of letters and the indexes.
cds.index: Persons and places mentioned in the edition as well as keywords in German, presented in three separate indexes.

guidelines.title: Documentation
guidelines.desc: Documentation about the encoding rules for ego document corpus and how to operate and manage the application

error.title: An error has occurred
error.message: An error has been generated by the application

spec.except: All the elements are included except:
